entry.title: Hello Python
entry.content: Welcome to BlueMonkey’s blog(https://github.com/msr12580)! This is my first blog, mainly about the problems I encountered in learning python, to share with the students like python, let’s make progress together, let the code into life. 下载安装python打开python官网1$ https://www.python.org/ More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
